member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.PointerManager.PointerOver
member.summary: Component specifying that the pointer is over the GameObject.
member.remarks: Automatically added or removed by the relative component.

member.name: T:FYFY_plugins.PointerManager.PointerSensitive
member.summary: Component allowing GameObject to be sensitive to the pointer. Add automatically a component when the pointer points the GameObject.

member.name: M:FYFY_plugins.PointerManager.PointerSensitive.OnPointerEnter(UnityEngine.EventSystems.PointerEventData)
member.summary: Called when the pointer enters the GameObject. Callback automatically called by Unity.

member.name: M:FYFY_plugins.PointerManager.PointerSensitive.OnPointerExit(UnityEngine.EventSystems.PointerEventData)
member.summary: Called when the pointer is not any longer over the GameObject. Callback automatically called by Unity.
